# amalitech-docked-utility-body



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                                                                                                        | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | -------- | ----------- |
| `name`   | `name`    | The name attribute should match the content attribute placed on an `amalitech-docked-utility-item` element to indicate that the body is associated with that item. | `string` | `undefined` |


## Slots

| Slot        | Description                                   |
| ----------- | --------------------------------------------- |
| `"close"`   | The close icon to be displayed in the header. |
| `"content"` | The content to be displayed in the body.      |
| `"logo"`    | The logo to be displayed in the header.       |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                                          | Description                                                               |
| --------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `--docked-utility-body-bg-color`              | The background color of the body default is `#fff`                        |
| `--docked-utility-body-border-color`          | The color of the border of the body default is `#c1c4d6`                  |
| `--docked-utility-body-max-width`             | The maximum width of the body default is `25rem`                          |
| `--docked-utility-body-padding`               | The padding of the body default is `1rem`                                 |
| `--docked-utility-body-width`                 | The width of the body default is `100vw`                                  |
| `--docked-utility-header-border-bottom`       | The color of the border at the bottom of the header default is `#eb9c7f`  |
| `--docked-utility-header-border-bottom-width` | The width of the border at the bottom of the header default is `0.125rem` |
